root.name: Scud: The Disposable Assassin
root.description: SCUD: The Disposable Assassin follows the exploits of SCUD, a robotic assassin of the SCUDCO Heartbreaker series. After realizing he would self-destruct after killing his target, SCUD decides to send his target, Jeff, to the hospital. To pay for the medical fees, SCUD then freelances as an assassin to pay for the bills. Â The video game is based on the Rob Schrab comic of the same name.
